trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Cottonwood
There were no other sightings in Cottonwood on or around June 19th 1997
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Disc with amber colored lights observed by multiple witnesses
divs: Sighting DetailsDisc shaped object passed over Verde River bed going NE to W. It had amber colored lights on the bottom. A second sighting occurred on June 20, 1997 around 1:00 a.m. in the morning, passing in front and over one of the witness' house. The object sparkled like "diamond." Other witnesses: June 19 sighting: Two neighbors (both retired military) observed the disc. They full moon revealed the object was made of some type of metal. Object had darkened windows. Smaller objects seen blinking alternating red and white lights. Large red orb-like object went across Mingus Mountain and was also accompanied by the smaller objects with the red and white lights. The same red orb-like object went behind the mountain and reappeared. Objects seemed to be "playing" with each other.
